valid: For the period 00:00 (UTC) on Wed 19 Nov 2025 to 00:00 (UTC) on Thu 20 Nov 2025
general_synopsis: New low expected northern Germany 998 by 1800 Wednesday

Viking.text:
Wind
Northerly or northwesterly 4 to 6, occasionally 7 in west, veering northerly or northeasterly 3 to 5 in east.
Sea state
Rough or very rough in west, moderate or rough in east.
Weather
Wintry showers, perhaps thundery, and also squally in west.
Visibility
Moderate or good, occasionally very poor.
